EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday, April 30th at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop - Dallas/Fort Worth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Thursday, April 30th in Dallas/Fort Worth, TX. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Thursday, April 30th, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/fortworth>
DFW Airport Marriott South 4151 S. Centerport Drive Fort Worth, Tx 76155 Maps & Directions <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/maps/travel/dfwam-dfw-airport-marriott-south/>
Parking Information Complimentary on-site Parking.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS?
Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or via cell at (408) 425-9302 <408-425-9302>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/fortworth>
